title: Time magazine names ‘Architects of AI’ as person of the year for 2025
description: The “Architects of AI” were named Time’s person of the year for 2025 on Thursday, with the magazine citing this year as when the potential of artificial intelligence “roared into view” with no turning back.
content:

title: 'Layoffs Are Not Due To Cost Cutting, But...': Amazon India's Amit Agarwal Shares The Real Reason Behind Job Cuts
description: Alongside the restructuring, Amazon is encouraging employees to leverage artificial intelligence to enhance productivity, emphasising technology as a cornerstone of its future strategy., Companies, Times Now
content: Amazon announced approximately 14,000 job cuts in October, impacting nearly 10 per cent of its white-collar workforce. In India, this affected 800–1,000 roles across finance, marketing, HR, and technology, according a report from The Economic Times. ... [1547 chars]

title: Instagram users given new algorithm controls
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Instagram on Wednesday unveiled a new artificial intelligence-powered feature that lets users view and adjust the algorithm shaping their Reels feed, calling it a pioneering move toward greater user control.
content:

title: InstaMed unveils AI-powered health care platform
description: INSTAMED Corp. celebrated a major milestone with the soft launch of InstaMedico, its artificial intelligence (AI)-driven telehealth and pharmaceutical logistics platform, aimed at transforming health care access across the Philippines.

title: Oracle forecasts miss Wall Street targets while spending rises
description: ORACLE forecast sales and profit that missed analyst estimates on Wednesday, while saying that spending would rise by $15 billion compared with earlier estimates ― a sign that big capital outlays to chase artificial intelligence (AI) cloud-computing customers is not turning into profit as fast as Wall Street had expected.

title: Adobe sees upbeat annual results on AI, design software strength
description: ADOBE forecast fiscal 2026 revenue and profit above Wall Street expectations on Wednesday, signaling strong demand for the Photoshop maker’s design tools and increasing monetization for its artificial intelligence (AI) offerings.

description: Investment in artificial intelligence (AI) will continue its meteoric rise in 2025, powered by a narrative that AI is not just a tool but a new workforce.

title: AI helps pilot free-flying robot around the International Space Station for 1st time ever
description: Researchers have used artificial intelligence to steer a free-flying robot aboard the International Space Station for the first time, potentially paving the way for more autonomous space missions.
content:
Navigating in a microgravity environment is a challenge even for trained human astronauts, but it is even more challenging for autonomous robots, limiting their use in places like a space station.
